1.name: Burn
1.desc: At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

2.name: Bleed
2.desc: When tossing an attack Coin, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

3.name: Tremor
3.desc: When attacked by skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect’s Potency. At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

4.name: Rupture
4.desc: When hit by an attack, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency. Then, reduce its Count by 1.

5.name: Sinking
5.desc: When hit by an attack, take fixed SP damage by the effect’s Potency. (Units with no Sanity take Gloom damage instead.) Then, reduce its Count by 1.

6.name: Poise
6.desc: On hit, gain a Potency-based chance to deal critical damage, reducing the Count by 1 if successful. At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

7.name: Charge
7.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Its Count can go up to 20. Count lowers by 1 at the end of each turn.

8.name: Damage Up
8.desc: Deal more damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

9.name: Damage Down
9.desc: Deal less damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

10.name: Offense Level Up
10.desc: Offense level increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

11.name: Offense Level Down
11.desc: Offense level decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

12.name: Defense Level Up
12.desc: Defense Level increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

13.name: Defense Level Down
13.desc: Defense Level decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn.

14.name: Haste
14.desc: Speed increases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

15.name: Bind
15.desc: Speed decreases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

16.name: Protection
16.desc: Take less damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

17.name: Fragile
17.desc: Take more damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

18.name: Paralyze
18.desc: Fix the Power of Coins to 0 for one turn, with one Coin per the effect’s Count.

19.name: Attack Power Up
19.desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

20.name: Attack Power Down
20.desc: Attack skills lose final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

21.name: Defense Power Up
21.desc: Defense skills gain final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

22.name: Defense Power Down
22.desc: Defense skills lose final Power by the effect's Count for one turn.

23.name: Slash DMG Up
23.desc: Deal more damage with Slash skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

24.name: Pierce DMG Up
24.desc: Deal more damage with Pierce skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

25.name: Blunt DMG Up
25.desc: Deal more damage with Blunt skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

26.name: Slash Fragility
26.desc: Take more damage from Slash skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

27.name: Pierce Fragility
27.desc: Take more damage from Pierce skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

28.name: Blunt Fragility
28.desc: Take more damage from Blunt skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

29.name: Ammo
29.desc: Spent by certain skills. Some attacks cancel if lacking Ammo.

1000.name: Tigermark Round
1000.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- At 8+ (cumulative sum of Tigermark Rounds and Savage Tigermark Rounds spent, gain Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] instead of Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣] from this unit's Passive
- Max Capacity: 12

1001.name: Tremor Burst
1001.desc: Raise target's Stagger Treshold by Tremor Potency on target

1002.name: Savage Tigermark Round
1002.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- At 8+ (cumulative sum of Tigermark Rounds and Savage Tigermark Rounds spent, gain Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] instead of Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣] from this unit's Passive
- Activates the same way as Tigermark Round does
- Max Capacity: 8

1003.name: Amplitude Conversion
1003.desc:
Converts Tremor or already converted Tremor into on target to a different type of Tremor.
Potency and Count values do not change over the conversion.

1004.name: Tremor - Scorch
1004.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Wrath damage equal to (sum of Tremor Potency and Burn Potency / 2), and lose 1 Burn Count
- When hit by skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise this unit's Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

1005.name: Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣]
1005.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference x 2.5)% damage (max 20%)
- Inflict +1 more Tremor Potency and Tremor Count with this unit's Skills
- If this unit has spent 8+ (sum of Tigermark Round and Savage Tigermark Round): at Turn End, convert this buff to Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] next turn
- Max Stack: 1

1006.name: Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心]
1006.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +3
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference x 5)% damage (max 40%)
- Inflict +2 more Tremor Potency and Tremor Count with this unit's Skills
- Max Stack: 1

1007.name: Overheat
1007.desc:
- Loses this effect when this unit gains Savage Tigermark Round
- Min & Max Speed +2
- Base Attack Skills Lose (cumulative number of Tigermark & Savage Tigermark Rounds spent / 2) Clash Power (max 10); however, gain the following effects(cumulative):
· 8+ Rounds spent: Gain 1 Protection for every 10% missing HP on self at Turn Start (max 5)
· 14+ Rounds spent: On Clash Lose, Unbreakable Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills deal +(75 + missing HP percentage on self)% damage (max 150%)
· 20+ Rounds Spent: Deal +(HP percentage difference)% damage against targets with higher remaining HP percentage than this unit (max 50%; except E.G.O Skills)

1008.name: Unbreakable Coin
1008.desc:
- This coin does not break upon Clash Lose.
- If an Attack Skill has this Coin, attack with this Coin after getting hit.
- Upon Clash Lose, fix the Coin Power of the unbroken Coin to 1.

1010.name: Tianjiu Star's Blade
1010.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- At 10+ Stack: at Turn End, gain 1 Haste next turn
- Used for certain Skills

1011.name: Deathrite【Haste】
1011.desc:
- Base Stack: 3
- When getting Rupture triggered by getting hit by an Attack Skill from a target with 10+ Speed, lose 1 Stack and gain +1 Rupture Count
- At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self; then, this effect expires
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

1012.name: Deathrite【Fissure】
1012.desc:
- Base Stack: 3
- When getting Rupture triggered while this unit has Deathrite, lose 1 Stack, and gain 1 Bind next turn
· When this effect activates, if this unit is to gain 3 or more Bind next turn, lose 2 Stacks instead of gaining Bind
- At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active.

1013.name: Assist Defense
1013.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- When an ally is about to take an Unopposed Attack from an enemy, consume 1 Stack to redirect the enemy's targeting to self; then, use the unique Skill that activates for Assist Defense
- When there are multiple allies with Assist Defense Stacks, the ally with the highest Stack has the highest activation priority
- Does not activate for allies who equipped Defense Skills
- Expires at Turn End

1014.name: Strider【Mao】
1014.desc:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: gain 5 Haste next turn
Reduced by 1 at Turn End

1015.name: Clashable Guard
1015.desc:
- On Clash Win: raise the target's Stagger Threshold by this unit's final Clash Power.
- On Clash Lose: when hit, reduce the attacker's final Skill Power by this unit's Final Power.
- On Clash Lose: does not gain Final Power from the following sources: Resonance and the Level disparity against the Attack Skill

1016.name: Mark of Decay
1016.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Take +10% damage from Gluttony Skills
- Take +10% damage from Deathrite
- Removed at Turn End
